long_description: The Timbuk2 Full-Cycle Envelope sleeve offers protection for devices up to the size of an iPad(R) or iPad(R) 2. Its slim profile maximizes portability without compromising protection. TSA approved; leave your device in the sleeve when you go through airport security. Durable ballistic and scratch-resistant tricot lining keeps your electronics cozy; high-density foam and seam construction provide impact protection. The Timbuk2 Full-Cycle Envelope sleeve features a secure rip-and-stick flap closure.
short_description: The Timbuk2 Full-Cycle Envelope sleeve offers protection for devices up to the size of an iPad(R) or iPad(R) 2. Its slim profile maximizes portability without compromising protection.
